item.title: Trouble with Packet 185
item.dc:creator: @davedave davedave
item.description:
@davedave wrote:

Well, long story short I’m trying to make a ‘select an option’ NPC Dialogues action buttons work.
This is what I have.

if (NPCID == 2253) { sendFrame164(2492); sendFrame126("Select an Option", 2493); sendFrame126("", 2494); sendFrame126("crap", 2495); sendFrame126("junk", 2496); sendFrame126("Spam..", 2497); sendFrame126("Nevermind.", 2498); }

This is what I have in packet 185.

if(actionButtonId == 2495) { sM("IT WORKS@&!*@&*!(@&*(!&@*(!&@*(!&*("); }

I think all I need to do is find the button ID’s for the Dialogue up there, how do I do this?
Yes, I tried searching…
All I can really come up with is ‘Download packet player 1.1, Build 185.’

Read full topic
